notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: AM-S gathered patent data from source, carried out the analysis and interpretation of data and drafted the manuscript; CG gathered publication data from source, carried out the analysis and participated in study design and coordination; FLF and MVPS carried out publication data analysis and interpretation of data; BPF conceived the study and was responsible for study design, data interpretation, and draft of the initial manuscript. All authors read, revised and approved the final manuscript.
